error.auth_sync: There was an unexpected issue while syncing the status of your authentication. Try to refresh your browser.

error.register_vote_unknown: Sorry, there was an unexpected error while registering the vote. Please try again later.
error.add_followee: Sorry, there was an unexpected error while adding the followee. Please try again later.
error.remove_followee: Sorry, there was an unexpected error while removing the followee. Please try again later.

error.transactions_not_found: An error occurred while loading the transactions.
error.canister_not_found: Sorry, the canister "$canister_id" was not found
error.join_community_fund: Sorry, there was an error joining the community fund. Please try again later.
error.dummy_proposal: There was an error creating the proposals. Check the console for more details.
error.update_delay: Sorry, there was an error updating the delay of the neuron
error.unknown: Sorry, there was an unexpected error. Please try again later.
error.amount_not_valid: Sorry, the amount is not valid
error.amount_not_enough_stake_neuron: Sorry, the amount is too small. You need a minimum of 1 ICP to stake a neuron
error.amount_not_enough_top_up_neuron: Sorry, the amount is too small. The amount plus the current stake need to be at least 1 ICP
error.stake_neuron: Sorry, there was an unexpected error staking the neuron. Please try again later.
error.transaction_error: Sorry, there was an error trying to execute the transaction.
error.unexpected_number_neurons_merge: Sorry, the number of neurons to merge should be only 2. Please try selecting again.
error.cannot_merge: Those two neurons cannot be merged.
error.split_neuron: Sorry, there was an unexpected error splitting the neuron. Please try again later.
error.not_authorized_neuron_action: Sorry, none of your principals is the controller of the neuron.
error.invalid_sender: Sorry, you can't send funds from this account.
error.insufficient_funds: Sorry, there are not enough funds in this account
error.transfer_error: Sorry, there was an error with the transaction. Please try again later.
error.merge_neurons_same_id: Two neurons with the same id can't be merged.
error.merge_neurons_not_same_controller: Two neurons need to have the same controller.
error.merge_neurons_not_same_manage_neuron_fol: Two neurons need to have the same followee on the topic of "Manage Neuron".
error.neuron_account_not_found: Sorry, the neuron has no account associated.
error.governance_error: Sorry, there was an error. Please try again.
error.invalid_account_id: Sorry, the account id is not valid. Please try again with a valid account id.
error.invalid_percentage: Sorry, the percentage amount is not valid.
error.input_length: Input must be longer than $length characters.
error.not_canister_controller: You are not the controller of this canister and cannot access its details.
error.canister_details_not_found: Sorry, there was an error loading the details of the canister. Please try again later.
error.controller_not_present: Principal is already not a controller.
error.pub_key_hex_string_invalid_length: The key must be >= 130 characters and <= 150 characters.
error.canister_refund: Sorry, the operation was not successful and the amount has been refunded.
error.canister_creation_unknown: Sorry, there was an error creating the canister.
error.canister_top_up_unknown: Sorry, there was an error adding cycles to the canister.
error.canister_update_settings: Sorry, there was an error updating the canister settings.
error.not_canister_controller_to_update: The current user is not the controller of the canister. Only controllers can change the settings.
error.limit_exceeded_topping_up_canister: Error topping up canister. ICP might have been transferred, refresh the page. Try again if not.
error.limit_exceeded_creating_canister: Error creating canister. Canister might be created, refresh the page. Try again if not.
error.sns_loading_commited_projects: Sorry, there was an error loading the projects.
error.swap_not_loaded: Sorry, there was an error loading the sale information.
error.transaction_fee_not_found: Sorry, there was an error loading the transaction fee.
error.fetch_transactions: Sorry, there was an error loading the transactions for this account.
error.transaction_data: Sorry, there was an error with the transaction $txId.
error.canister_invalid_transaction: Sorry, there was a problem with the transaction.

warning.auth_sign_out: You have been logged out because your session has expired.

header.menu: Open menu to access navigation options
header.title: NETWORK NERVOUS SYSTEM
header.account_menu: Open menu to access logout button

accounts.attach_hardware_subtitle: Link a hardware wallet to this account
accounts.attach_hardware_neurons_text: The following are neurons controlled by the hardware wallet. You can optionally add the NNS dapp as a hotkey to these neurons, which allows you to manage the neurons directly from the Neurons tab.
accounts.connect_hardware_wallet_text: Connect your hardware wallet to link it to the account
accounts.show_info_hardware_wallet: Show Principal And Address On Device
accounts.enter_address_or_select: Enter a destination address or select an account.
accounts.hardware_wallet_add_hotkey_text_neuron: This action will add your NNS dapp principal as a hotkey to neuron $neuronId.
accounts.hardware_wallet_add_hotkey_text_confirm: Are you sure you want to continue?

neurons.title: Neurons
neurons.text: Earn rewards by staking your ICP in neurons. Neurons allow you to participate in governance on the Internet Computer by voting on Network Nervous System (NNS) proposals.
neurons.add_user_as_hotkey_message: To see and manage this neuron in the NNS app, please add the NNS app as a hotkey.
neurons.add_user_as_hotkey_success: Your principal was added to the neuron successfully.
neurons.may_take_while: This may take up to one minute
neurons.dissolve_delay_description: Voting power is given when neurons are locked for at least 6 months
neurons.merge_neurons_article_title: IC NNS Neurons Can Now Be Merged
neurons.cannot_merge_neuron_community: Neurons that joined the Community Fund can't be merged.
neurons.cannot_merge_neuron_spawning: Neurons that are spawning can't be merged.
neurons.cannot_merge_neuron_hotkey: You cannot merge neurons controlled by a hotkey.
neurons.cannot_merge_hardware_wallet: Merging of neurons controlled via hardware wallet is not yet supported.
neurons.only_merge_two: You can only merge two neurons at a time.
neurons.need_two_to_merge: You need at least two neurons to merge

new_followee.title: Enter New Followee
new_followee.same_neuron: You can't add the same neuron as followee.
new_followee.already_followed: You are already following this neuron.

follow_neurons.description: Follow neurons to automate your voting, and receive the maximum voting rewards. You can follow neurons on specific topics or all topics.
follow_neurons.topic_0_title: All Except Governance, and SNS & Community Fund
follow_neurons.topic_0_subtitle: Follow neurons on all proposal topics except the governance topic, and SNS & Community Fund.
follow_neurons.topic_1_subtitle: Proposals that manage specific neurons, for example making them perform actions.
follow_neurons.topic_2_subtitle: All proposals that provide “real time” information about the value of ICP, as measured by an IMF SDR, which allows the NNS to convert ICP to cycles (which power computation) at a rate which keeps their real world cost constant.
follow_neurons.topic_3_subtitle: Proposals that administer network economics, for example, determining what rewards should be paid to node operators.
follow_neurons.topic_4_subtitle: All proposals that administer governance, for example to freeze malicious canisters that are harming the network.
follow_neurons.topic_5_subtitle: All proposals that administer node machines somehow, including, but not limited to, upgrading or configuring the OS, upgrading or configuring the virtual machine framework and upgrading or configuring the node replica software.
follow_neurons.topic_6_subtitle: All proposals that administer network participants, for example, granting and revoking DCIDs (data center identities) or NOIDs (node operator identities).
follow_neurons.topic_7_subtitle: All proposals that administer network subnets, for example creating new subnets, adding and removing subnet nodes, and splitting subnets.
follow_neurons.topic_8_subtitle: Installing and upgrading “system” canisters that belong to the network. For example, upgrading the NNS.
follow_neurons.topic_9_subtitle: Proposals that update KYC information for regulatory purposes, for example during the initial Genesis distribution of ICP in the form of neurons.
follow_neurons.topic_12_subtitle: Proposals handling updates of a subnet's replica version
follow_neurons.topic_13_subtitle: Proposals dealing with blessing and retirement of replica versions
follow_neurons.topic_14_subtitle: Proposals related to SNS and Community Fund

voting.title: Voting
voting.text: The Internet Computer network runs under the control of the Network Nervous System, which adopts proposals and automatically executes corresponding actions. Anyone can submit a proposal, which are decided as the result of voting activity by neurons.
voting.hide_unavailable_proposals: Show only proposals you can still vote for
voting.nothing_found: No proposals found for the filters.

canisters.title: Canisters
canisters.text: Developers can create and manage their canisters (a form of smart contracts) and cycles consumption here.
canisters.create_canister_subtitle: Create a new canister, to deploy your application
canisters.create_canister_success: New canister with id $canisterId created successfully
canisters.link_canister_subtitle: Enter the id of a canister, to top up its cycles
canisters.minimum_cycles_text_1: Minimum amount: 2T Cycles (inclusive of 1T Cycles fee if creating a new canister)
canisters.minimum_cycles_text_2: Transaction fee of $amount is charged to the source account.
canisters.transaction_fee: The Transaction fee of $amount is charged to the source account.

canister_detail.title: Canister
canister_detail.confirm_detach_description_1: This will remove the canister from your account, it does not change the controller.
canister_detail.confirm_detach_description_2: If you control the canister, ensure you have its identifier stored securely.
canister_detail.confirm_remove_controller_description: Are you sure you want to remove the following controller?
canister_detail.confirm_remove_controller_user_descripti: Are you sure you want to remove the current user from the controllers?
You will lose access to the canister.
canister_detail.confirm_remove_last_controller_descripti: This is the last remaining controller. If you remove it, nobody will be able to control the canister.

busy_screen.pending_approval_hw: Please use your hardware wallet to approve.

proposal_detail.title: Proposal
proposal_detail.proposer_description: The ID of the neuron that submitted the proposal.
proposal_detail.created_description: The date when this proposal was created.
proposal_detail.decided_description: The date when this proposal was adopted or rejected.
proposal_detail.executed_description: The date when this adopted proposal was executed.
proposal_detail.failed_description: The date when this adopted proposal failed to be executed.

proposal_detail__vote.headline: Cast Vote
proposal_detail__vote.confirm_adopt_text: You are about to cast $votingPower votes for this proposal, are you sure you want to proceed?
proposal_detail__vote.confirm_reject_text: You are about to cast $votingPower votes against this proposal, are you sure you want to proceed?
proposal_detail__vote.vote_status_registering: Neurons registered: $completed/$amount. Keep the dapp open until completed.

proposal_detail__ineligible.headline: Ineligible Neurons
proposal_detail__ineligible.text: The following neurons had a dissolve delay of less than 6 months at the time the proposal was submitted, or were created after the proposal was submitted, and therefore are not eligible to vote on it:

neuron_detail.title: Neuron
neuron_detail.voting_power_tooltip_with_stake:
Calculated as:
(ICP staked + maturity staked) x Dissolve Delay Bonus x Age Bonus
($stake + $st4kedMaturity) x $delayMultiplier x $ageMultiplier
neuron_detail.join_community_fund_description: Are you sure you want this neuron to join the community fund?
neuron_detail.leave_community_fund_description: Are you sure you want this neuron to leave the community fund?
neuron_detail.auto_stake_maturity_on: Are you sure that you would like to automatically stake new maturity of this neuron?
neuron_detail.auto_stake_maturity_off: Are you sure that you would like to stop automatically staking new maturity of this neuron?
neuron_detail.community_fund_more_info: Check here for more information.
neuron_detail.stake_maturity_disabled_tooltip: Currently, you do not have any maturity available to stake into this neuron.
neuron_detail.stake_maturity_tooltip: Merge Maturity has been replaced by Stake Maturity. Learn more.
neuron_detail.merge_maturity_tooltip: When your neuron votes, maturity increases. For neurons controlled by a hardware wallet, maturity can either be merged, which mints and stakes new ICP, or it can be used to spawn a new neuron containing newly minted ICP. Increases in maturity can take place up to four days after voting.
neuron_detail.start_dissolve_description:
This will cause your neuron to lose its age bonus.
Are you sure you wish to continue?
neuron_detail.stop_dissolve_description: Are you sure you want to stop the dissolve process?
neuron_detail.join_community_fund_success: Your neuron has successfully joined the community fund.
neuron_detail.leave_community_fund_success: Your neuron has successfully left the community fund.
neuron_detail.following_description: Following allows you to delegate your votes to another neuron holder. You still earn rewards if you delegate your voting rights. You can change your following at any time.
neuron_detail.merge_neurons_success: Your neurons have been successfully merged.
neuron_detail.split_neuron_success: Your neuron has successfully been split.
neuron_detail.split_neuron_disabled_tooltip: Neuron needs a minimum stake of $amount ICP to be splittable.
neuron_detail.merge_maturity_disabled_tooltip: You need at least the equivalent of $amount ICP to merge maturity.
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_disabled_tooltip: You need at least the equivalent of $amount ICP ($min / $varibility) to spawn a new neuron from maturity.
neuron_detail.invalid_hotkey: Hotkey not valid. Refresh the page and try again.
neuron_detail.merge_maturity_modal_description: Choose how much of your neuron's maturity to merge into its stake.
neuron_detail.merge_maturity_confirmation: Are you sure you wish to merge $percentage of your neuron's earned maturity into its stake?
neuron_detail.stake_maturity_modal_description: Choose how much of the maturity available to stake into this neuron.
neuron_detail.stake_maturity_confirmation: Are you sure you wish to stake $percentage of the maturity available?
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_modal_description: Choose how much of your neuron's maturity to give to the new neuron.
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_confirmation_q: Are you sure you wish to spawn a new neuron?
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_confirmation_a: This will use $percentage of your neuron's earned maturity for the new neuron
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_choose: Choose how much of the maturity available to spawn.
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_explanation_1: Burn maturity to mint new ICP tokens. This will cause a new neuron to be spawned in your account. In one week, new ICP tokens will be minted and added to this neuron. At that time, it will be possible to disburse the new ICP tokens from inside the neuron into an account.
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_explanation_2: The quantity of new ICP minted will depend on the ICP price trend at the time (see the wiki page). The newly minted ICP may be seen as income by tax authorities, since it is a kind of cryptocurrency, and you should plan accordingly. Always speak to a tax advisor.
neuron_detail.spawn_neuron_note_hw: Neurons controlled by hardware wallets can only spawn 100% of their maturity.
neuron_detail.spawning_neuron_info: When this neuron has finished spawning, newly minted ICP will be added. The quantity of new ICP minted will depend on the ICP price trend. You will then be able to disburse this new ICP if you wish.

sns_launchpad.no_committed_projects: No launched projects at the moment
sns_launchpad.no_open_projects: Looks like there's no SNSs launching right now. More about creating SNSs.
sns_launchpad.no_proposals: No current proposals at the moment

sns_project_detail.participate_swap_warning: Your participation cannot be withdrawn by you. If the sale is not successful, your commitment will be automatically transferred back to your main ICP account.
sns_project_detail.understand_agree: I understand and want to proceed.
sns_project_detail.participate_success: Your participation has been successfully committed.

sns_neuron_detail.add_hotkey_info: In order to use this neuron to vote from the corresponding dapp, you have to add your personal dapp ID as a hotkey here. Please refer to the instructions given by the corresponding dapp.
sns_neuron_detail.add_hotkey_tooltip: In order to use this neuron to vote from the corresponding dapp, you have to add your personal dapp ID as a hotkey here. Please refer to the instructions given by the corresponding dapp.

error__ledger.incorrect_identifier: Wallet account identifier doesn't match. Are you sure you connected the right hardware wallet? Expected identifier: $identifier. Wallet identifier: $ledgerIdentifier.

auth_accounts.title: Your ICP wallet
auth_accounts.text: Create and link accounts (including hardware wallets), transfer ICP, participate in Internet Computer governance by staking ICP in neurons, and earn voting rewards.

auth_neurons.title: Earn staking rewards
auth_neurons.text: Earn rewards by staking your ICP in neurons. Neurons allow you to participate in governance on the Internet Computer by submitting and voting on Network Nervous System (NNS) proposals.

auth_proposals.title: Be part of the ICP community!
auth_proposals.text: Participate in the governance of the Internet Computer and receive voting rewards. Shape the future of the web by submitting your own proposals.

auth_canisters.title: Run your code on the Internet Computer
auth_canisters.text: Create and manage your canister smart contracts and top them up with cycles here. Anywhere, anytime.

auth_sns.title: Service Nervous Systems (SNS)
auth_sns.text: Put the autonomy in DAO. No centralized power, no administrative overhead, no legal headache, only code and its community.
